page.title: 07Thomas's family life
page.content: My family, mum, dad, sister, brother and I, have two dogs and a cat. My dad works at Robertson's Research near Llandudno some twenty miles away. My mum is a teacher at a private school near here. My sister and I go to Cae Top Primary School and my brother to Friars Comprehensive school, which dates from 1557. On most weekends my dad either plays golf or we all go fishing. Before we came to Bangor we lived in London and my dad worked for Letraset.We used to go to a school called Strand-on-the-Green. We moved because my mum was born in Wales. We wanted to live in a more rural area and most of our relations live in Wales.
